author: mmusich
body:
Fixing a typo in the definition of the `SiStripBackPlaneCorrectionFakeESSource.cc` plugin name, that conflicts with the usage in the python fragment https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/70ed86c1337ca9094ba467915ba5cedd7a22665e/CalibTracker/SiStripESProducers/python/fake/SiStripBackPlaneCorrectionFakeESSource_cfi.py#L3
Discovered thanks to work done for resurrecting the CosmicRack Tracking [details](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/CosmicRackTracking#cRACK_tracking_code_setup).
title: [10.1.X] fix typo in SiStripBackPlaneCorrectionFakeESSource plugin definition name
